byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Hwaida Saad and Maher Samaan from Beirut, Lebanon, Karam Shoumali from Istanbul and Karen Zraick from New York.

abstract: Islamic State militants invade several Assyrian Christian villages in northeastern Syria, taking hostages, including both civilians and fighters; estimates of hostages taken range from several dozen to more than 100.
lead_paragraph: The exact number of hostages seized remained unclear, with estimates ranging from several dozen to more than 100.

headline.main: Scores of Syrian Christians Kidnapped by Islamic State
headline.print_headline: Scores of Syrian Christians Kidnapped by Islamic State

snippet: The exact number of hostages seized remained unclear, with estimates ranging from several dozen to more than 100.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
